name: Won-Hyo
meaning: Won Hyo was the noted monk who introduced Buddhism to the Silla Dynasty in 686 A.D.

moves.title: Close ready stance A
moves.description: Close ready stance A, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Form right L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: Knifehand inward strike
moves.description: Remain facing 9 o'clock. Perform right high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: Middle side punch
moves.description: Slip into left fixed stance. Perform middle side punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Bring left foot to right foot. Turn to face 3 o'clock into left L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High knifehand inward strike
moves.description: Remain facing 3 o'clock. Perform left high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: Middle side punch
moves.description: Slip into right fixed stance. Perform middle side punch.

moves.title: Bending ready stance guarding block
moves.description: Bring right foot to left foot. Form right bending ready stance A facing 12 o'clock. Perform outer forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle side piercing kick
moves.description: Facing 12 o'clock, perform left middle side piercing kick.

moves.title: Middle knifehand guarding block
moves.description: Lower the kicking leg into right L-stance. Perform middle knifehand guarding block facing 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle knifehand guarding block
moves.description: Step forward into left L-stance. Perform middle knifehand guarding block facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Middle knifehand guarding block
moves.description: Step forward into right L-stance. Perform middle knifehand guarding block facing 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle straight fingertip thrust
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Perform right middle straight fingertip thrust facing 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde sun sonkut tulgi

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot left 270 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Form right L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High knifehand inward strike
moves.description: Remain facing 3 o'clock. Perform right high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: Middle side punch
moves.description: Slip into left fixed stance. Perform middle side punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Bring left foot to right foot. Pivot left to face 9 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High knifehand inward strike
moves.description: Remain facing 9 o'clock. Perform left high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: Middle side punch
moves.description: Slip into right fixed stance. Perform middle side punch.

moves.title: Right middle circular block
moves.description: Bring right foot to left foot. Turn left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform right middle circular block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde dollimyo makgi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, perform right low front snap kick.

moves.title: Middle reverse punch
moves.description: Lower the right foot into walking stance. Perform middle reverse punch facing 6 o'clock.

moves.title: Middle circular block
moves.description: Remain facing 6 o'clock. Perform left middle circular block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok dollimyo makgi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, perform left low front snap kick.

moves.title: Middle reverse punch
moves.description: Lower the left foot into walking stance. Perform middle reverse punch facing 6 o'clock.

moves.title: Bending ready stance guarding block
moves.description: Bring right foot to left foot. Form left bending ready stance A facing 6 o'clock. Perform middle guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle side piercing kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, perform right middle side piercing kick.

moves.title: Middle guarding block
moves.description: Lower right foot next to left foot. Pivot left 270 degrees to face 3 o'clock into right L-stance. Perform middle guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle guarding block
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot into left L-stance. Perform guarding block facing 9 o'clock.
moves.korean: niunja so bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Close ready stance A
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Move right foot into close ready stance A.
